attacks.name: Extra Claws
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Power Blow
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Breloom.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: PokéNav
text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, and choose a Basic Pokémon, Evolution card, or Energy card. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Put the 2 other cards back on top of your deck in any order.

attacks.name: Snap Tail
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Super Hypno Wave
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin, If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Cross Chop
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

cards.name: Professor Birch
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Draw cards from your deck until you have 6 cards in your hand.

cards.name: Battle Frontier
text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Each player's Colorless Evolved Pokémon, Darkness Evolved Pokémon, and Metal Evolved Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.

cards.name: Double Full Heal
text: Remove all Special Conditions from each of your Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Lanette's Net Search
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Search your deck for up to 3 different types of Basic Pokémon cards (excluding Baby Pokémon), show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Lum Berry
text: Attach Lum Berry to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it. If that Pokémon is Knocked Out, discard this card.
At any time between turns, if the Pokémon this card is attached to is affected by any Special Conditions, remove all of them. Then, discard Lum Berry.

cards.name: Metal Energy
text: Damage done by attacks to the Pokémon that Metal Energy is attached to is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). Ignore this effect if the Pokémon that Metal Energy is attached to isn't Metal. Metal Energy provides Metal Energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

cards.name: Multi Energy
text: Attach Multi Energy to 1 of your Pokémon. While in play, Multi Energy provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. (Has no effect other than providing Energy.) Multi Energy provides Colorless Energy when attached to a Pokémon that already has Special Energy cards attached to it.

cards.name: Camerupt ex

ability.name: Magma Armor
ability.text: Camerupt ex can't be Asleep or Paralyzed.

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Eruption
attacks.text: Each player discards the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.

cards.name: Milotic ex

ability.name: Mystic Scale
ability.text: As long as Milotic ex is in play, each player can't play any Technical Machine cards from his or her hand. Discard all Technical Machine cards in play (both yours and your opponent's).

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Gentle Wrap
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.text: Move 1 basic Energy card attached to Milotic ex to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Regice ex
text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Iceberg Crush
attacks.text: If Regirock ex is in play, flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

ability.name: Heal Dance
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Heal Dance Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Gardevoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

ability.name: Water Cyclone
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy attached to 1 of your Active Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Swampert is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

ability.name: Baby Evolution
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.

attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Firebreathing
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

cards.name: Darkness Energy
text: If the Pokémon Darkness Energy is attached to attacks, the attack does 10 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). Ignore this effect unless the Attacking Pokémon is Darkness or has Dark in its name. Darkness Energy provides Darkness Energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

cards.name: Cacturne ex

ability.name: Cursed Glare
ability.text: As long as Cacturne ex is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't attach any Special Energy cards (except for Darkness and Metal Energy cards) from his or her hand to his or her Active Pokémon.

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

cards.name: Oran Berry
text: Attach Oran Berry to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it. If that Pokémon is Knocked Out, discard this card.
At any time between turns, if the Pokémon this card is attached to has at least 2 damage counters on it, remove 2 damage counters from it. Then, discard Oran Berry.

cards.name: Scott
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Search your deck for up to 3 cards in any combination of Supporter cards and Stadium cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Wally's Training
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Search your deck for a card that evolves from your Active Pokémon (choose 1 if there are 2) and put it on your Active Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
